ordered_victim_rescue.condition: Severe burn injuries, unable to move
Minor smoke inhalation, conscious and able to communicate
Moderate burn injuries, partially trapped under debris

action_details: Based on the severity of the fire and the victims' conditions, we will prioritize rescuing V1 first due to their severe burn injuries. Once V1 is safely evacuated, we will focus on rescuing V2 as they are partially trapped under debris and require urgent attention. Finally, we will rescue V3 last as their condition is relatively stable compared to the others.
